attributes.name: Dell Technologies Credit
details: Statement credits up to $150 on U.S. purchases directly with Dell Technologies, and an additional $1,000 statement credit after you spend $5,000 or more on those purchases, per calendar year. Enrollment required.â€¡
attributes.conditions: Must enroll for benefit. First $150 credit on any Dell purchases. Additional $1,000 credit unlocked after spending $5,000+ on Dell purchases in same calendar year. Must purchase directly from Dell.
